title: The Times Spent in Pretense - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Historical   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Ancient China   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   Enemies Become Allies   Famous Parents   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Abilities   Imperial Harem   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Lucky Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Politics   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Smart Couple   Underestimated Protagonist
author: Butterfly's Shadow Beneath the Moon   Yue Xia Die Ying   月下蝶影
description:
No matter male or female, the members of the Hua clan had been loyal for generations, placing the utmost importance on protecting their nation. The monarch and his subjects were in harmony, sharing all kinds of emotions, all due to the ties of comradeship in their hearts.

Once the weather cooled, would the favored crown prince fall from power?

No.

Once the weather warmed, would the loyal and brave marquess estate be disposed of after its use?

No.>
